FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Hold the Line

  1. If Hold the Line heals a character to 0 damage while Barrage is attacking, does Barrage still get Bold 2? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. The Hold the Line is revealed and repairs when the defending character 'defends' (1.3.1.5 of the Expanded Rules), whereas the Bold value isn't locked in until later when the Bold and Tough are calculated (1.3.2.2 of the Expanded Rules).
